owner.biography: Wheelthrown ceramics inspired by & made in East London.

node.text:
First pot of the year! 
Felt a bit rusty returning to the studio this week. It had been over a month since I had last laid hands on a fresh lump of clay and I didn't realise how much I had missed it.
.
.
.
#potterylife #potterystudio #potteryprocess #throwing #stoneware #mugtobe #ceramic #ceramicstudio #throwingpottery #throwingpots #wheelthrown #pylonceramics #handmadeuk #madeinhackney

node.text:
Last chance to shop for Christmas presents @canopy_market. 
Also put a handful of pieces up on my @etsyuk page, including couple of mugs. Working on adding vases and planters. Order by Tuesday, 3pm UK time for delivery in time for Christmas. 
.
.

node.text:
On the to-do list today: glazing, glazing, glazing. 
I'll be bringing a bunch new pieces to @canopy_market @realfoodfest this weekend. Here they are after their first firing, also known as bisque, and are a delightful pink. Whish I could keep them like this, but they are still fragile at this stage and very absorbent. 
.
.
.
#potterystudio #potteryprocess #makingprogress #glazing #potterylife #ceramicstudio #bisque #canopymarket #pylonceramics

@realfoodfest @canopy_market

.

node.text:
Been working hard these last few weeks to get work ready for this weekend's @realfoodfest @canopy_market ! 
As it's a bank holiday weekend, I'll be there Fri - Mon. So London peeps, come to King's Cross for food, designer maker market and a stroll along the Regent's Canal. 
.
.
.

node.text:
It's one of those very rare occasions where I actually have a few travel cups in stock! 
Maybe I'm finally getting better at making cups to size? Or just luck? Either way, get them while they last! Some have silicone lids, others fit the spill proof plastic lids. All come with my handmade cork sleeves. 
Available at @realfoodfest
@canopy_market in King's Cross all weekend..
.
.

.
.

.
.

owner.biography: Wheelthrown ceramics inspired by & made in East London.

node.text:
This one's fresh from the kiln and making me feel quite excited. I have also finally decided what to call this new glaze: eucalyptus. After lots of head scratching and all your suggestions, I felt it looked most like the beautifully blue-green leaves of eucalyptus gunii. And this pot is as round as it's leaves. 
Pot is coming to @canopy_market @realfoodfest in King's Cross tomorrow. 
.
.
.
#newglaze #eucalyptus #natureinspired #moonjar #pylonceramics #canopymarket #kingscross #thingstodoinlondon #productdevelopment #pottery #ceramics #ceramicplantpot

.
.

node.text:
I've been working my socks off to get more work ready for @canopy_market @realfoodfest this weekend. The kiln is on and I'm praying to the kiln god's for a good glaze firing. I'll have mugs! Some with handles, some without and more spoon rests because they were all snapped up on the Bank holiday weekend. 
.
.
.
#canopymarket #handmadeuk #mugs #cups #spoonrests #biscuitplate #pylonceramics #makerlife #potterylife #makersgonnamake #busybee #needmorecoffee

node.text:
Thank you so much to all who came to see me and bought a pot or two over the last 4 days at @canopy_market . I'm exhausted, but very happy now and about to head to the studio after having a much needed lie in this morning. 
I'll be back at @canopy_market @realfoodfest in 2 week's time! 
.
.
.
#grateful #tired #market #markettrader #smallbusinesslife #bosslady #makersgonnamake #canopymarket #smallbusiness #shopsmall #shophandmade #handmadeuk #pylonceramics #coffeewillsaveme

owner.biography: Wheelthrown ceramics inspired by & made in East London.

node.text:
Made a utensil holder. Or is it a vase? It's here modelled by the whisk and spatula I use for mixing glazes. Because we potters like to use whatever we can find as tools. My old @london_cycling_campaign membership card for example is one of my favourite tools. 
.
.
.
#tools #utensilholder #kitchendecor #cookingtools #wheelthrown #ceramicutensilholder #pylonceramics #canopymarket #ceramicvase #multifunctional

owner.biography: Wheelthrown ceramics inspired by & made in East London.

node.text:
Little bit in love with this big planter and the delicious drips in the glaze. It always makes me so happy when the glaze does that. 
.
.
.
#drippyglaze #planter #plantpot  #ceramicplantpot #wheelthrownpottery #pylonceramics #oribe #sexydrips #cachepot #stoneware #freshfromthekiln

owner.biography: Wheelthrown ceramics inspired by & made in East London.

node.text:
Lots of cups and a handful of mugs were glazed on Tuesday and I'm about to go and unload the kiln now. 🤞🏻 Hope it was a good glaze firing! 
All that turned out nice will be coming to @canopy_market @realfoodfest this weekend, Fri - Mon. 
These pieces here have been fired once. After that I give them a light sanding to remove any burrs or sharp corners before glazing and firing them again. I love their blush pink colour at this stage. 
.
.
.
#bisque #bisqueware #glazing #stoneware #potteryprocess #potterystudio #studiolife #makingprocess #clay #handmade #madewithlove #pylonceramics #canopymarket #handmadeuk

node.text:
Love a cheeseboard lunch. Adding a bit of green to an otherwise quite beige meal in the form of cress grown in a Doris the hedgehog dish. Nom!
.
Cheese is a delicious Saint Felicien from @lepicerie56 and the bowl is from @toepfereischmidt in Germany.
.
.
.
#cresshedgehog #hedghogdish #hedgehogplate #hedgehog #cress #growyourownfood #quickmeals #cheeseboard #frenchcheese #saintfelicien #pylonceramics #supportsmallbusiness #supportlocal #handmadeceramics

node.text:
It's a beautiful day, today and I thoroughly enjoyed my coffee break out in the garden. That's a @meerasodha (not blood) orange cake on the biscuit plate today. Bloody delicious, if I do say so myself. What are you doing to make the best of the glorious sunshine today? 
.
.
.

.
.

node.text:
Now they're all pink!
I often wish the pots could keep the dusty pink colour they have after their bisque (1st) firing. But they are porous and still fragile at this stage and not suitable for any kind of functional use. 
.
.
.
#potteryprocess #ceramicsofinstagram #ceramicprogress #potterystudio #fromclaytoceramic #handmade #potterykiln #pylonceramics #wheelthrown #rohdekiln #bisqueware

node.text:

.
.
.

.

node.text:
Don't forget to sit down to a nice cuppa and a biscuit sometimes. It's such a busy time for many of us at the moment, it can be hard to find time to relax. Look after yourselves, my lovelies! 
.
.
.
#ceramiccup #mexicanweddingcookies #haveabreak #handmadeceramics #homebaking #shopsmall #shoplocal #selfcare #pylonceramics #pottery #oribe #justacard #justacup

node.text:
Candlestick holders have been so popular recently I only have one left in my Bramble (speckled pink) glaze. Wonder who's going to snap that one up from my Etsy shop? 
The next batch is in the kiln right now and all those not already promised to people will be up on Etsy early next week. 
.
.
.
#ceramicsofinstagram #candlestickholders #ceramiccandleholder #candleholder #etsy #etsyshop #cosyhome #winter #homedecor #pylonceramics #handmadeceramics #handcrafted

node.text:
Chocolate covered gingerbread treat with my coffee today (in a @harrietchealceramics mug). I'm super busy in the studio atm, making sure I get all your commissions ready in time for Christmas. Also work towards an Etsy shop update in early December. 
.
.
.
#makersgonnamake #biscuitplate #gingerbread #germangingerbread #coffee #pottery #potterslife #chriatmas #pylonceramics #ceramicsofinstagram

node.text: Packing lots of snacks for a busy day at the studio today. And coffee. What will get you through today?

owner.biography: Wheelthrown ceramics inspired by & made in East London.

node.text:
Huge thanks to all who came out to @canopy_market this past weekend. It was great to chat to customers old and new, and to catch up and meet  fellow traders. 
See you all IRL on the other side and until, let's all support each other on here.
.
.
.
#makermarket #makersgonnamake #craftmarket #canopymarket #eastendtradesguild #shopsmall #shoplocal #shopindependent #london #lockdown #pylonceramics #justacard #supportsmallbusiness

node.text: Who's going to get their mittens on the last biscuit plate today? At @canopy_market til 6pm today! Come on down and get your Christmas shopping started!

node.text:
I know Christmas still seems ages away, but it'll be here quicker than you think. So if you've been thinking of getting something special made for someone (or yourself), get in touch now! Last date to submit a commissions to be ready for Christmas is 8th November. 
.
.
.
#commission #handmadeceramics #madetoorder #handmade #wheelthrownpottery #madeinlondon #madeinlondon #pylonceramics #christmas #gifts

node.text:

Friday, 12-8pm
Saturday, 11-6pm
Sunday, 11-6pm
.
.
.

node.text:
I sure know how to have fun on a Friday evening. 😜🤦🏻‍♀️ Trimmed a bunch of cups for a commission. 
If there's anything you'd like me to make for you in time for the holidays, now is the time! 
.
.
.

.
.
.
